extendedInfo.description: If you are Chris Young's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Chris Young's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Chris Young's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Chris Young's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Chris Young- The Man I Want to Be- Neon************************List of lyrics ************************- Beer Or Gasoline- Burn- Center Of My World- Don't Leave Her (If You Can't Let Her Go)- Drinkin' Me Lonely- Flashlight- Flowers- Gettin' You Home (The Black Dress Song)- I Can Take It From There- I'm Gonna Change That- I'm Headed Your Way, JosÃ©- It Takes A Man- Lay It On Me- Lost- Neon- Old Love Feels New- Rainy Night In Georgia- Rose In Paradise- Save Water, Drink Beer- She's Got This Thing About Her- Small Town Big Time- That Makes Me- The Dashboard- The Man I Want To Be- The Shoebox- Tomorrow- Twenty One Candles- Voices- When She's On- White Lightning Hit The Family Tree- Who's Gonna Take Me Home- You- You're Gonna Love Me
